title: Cannabis Focus Shifting From Expansion To Profitability With Debra Borchardt
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Debra Borchardt, CEO, Co-founder and Editor-in-Chief of cannabis financial news site Green Market Report, joins us for our 50th episode to discuss the state of the cannabis market. We cover the disruptive possibility of the US descheduling cannabis, the state of the US, Canadian and international markets. We also discuss why Debra's bullish on Trulieve despite short report, as well as Cresco Labs, Green Thumb Industries and Acreage Holdings. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
